text: Tarja Halonen (born December 24, 1943http://www.britannica.com/eb/question-711046/49/Tarja-Halonen-born Retrieved on 10 October 2007) is the former President of Finland. She is from Helsinki. She was elected in 2000 and 2006. Her mandate ended in 2012 and she left office on 1 March 2012. ==References== Category:1943 births Category:Living people Category:Presidents of Finland Category:Politicians from Helsinki Category:Social Democratic Party of Finland politicians
title: Tarja Halonen
